entry.title: Strawberry Waffles
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,108Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 65

Summary: “Like a date?” You ask in a near whisper. Jason looks like he's been electrocuted but slowly he nods his head twice. “Yeah. A date. You and me, the school dance.” Oh. Your heart feels like it's beating so fast it's going to stop at any second. But you nod, your face warm, and there's no way you can stop yourself from smiling now. “Um, y- yeah.” You stammer before clearing your throat softly. “Yes.” You say, more confident in your answer. “Yes, I would.. love to go with you. On a date. To the dance.” Or Jason Todd becomes a girl dad after dying and coming back to life

entry.title: hello, angel; where are you?
entry.summary:
Author: sunshown

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,313Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: You’ve dreamt of him 213 times. The first time, you were thirteen in both the dream and otherwise, feet off the side of the roof of an apartment complex that your aunt lived in. You’re sitting next to a boy with a bandaid on his cheek and battered sneakers, and he shoves a popsicle stick in your face. You look at it instead of him -- 25 points -- and spend the next few minutes destroying the remnants of your popsicle until it reads an embarrassing 5 points. You turn to the boy, look at him. As he starts to speak, the dream ends. —You spend your life dreaming of Jason. This is how you find each other.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 53,913Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 440

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.

entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,495Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 77

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony… until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.summary:
Author: sugarykisses

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,377Chapters: 2/30Kudos: 71

Summary: ──── You spent your teenage years pining for your best friend's hot older brother, Dick Grayson. Now that you've finally grown out of your awkward phase, he's slowly noticing you. entry.title: Anywhere and Everywhere
entry.summary:
Author: Thewriting_hub

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,861Chapters: 15/35Kudos: 363

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. Sometimes it comforted you knowing you would never truly be without him but sometimes it was very inconvenient. Like tonight, Scarecrow was planning on a mass release of his newest fear toxin, not to mention he was working with someone new on the Gotham crime scene but they seemed so very familiar.

entry.title: You're beautiful in my eyes
entry.summary:
Author: TheEndIsNeverTheEnd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,338Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Gotham is a city filled with crime, garbage, hatred, and murder. A clear class difference from the rich and poor, and the obvious hold angry men in costumes has over the city. Yet with everything wrong with it, there you are in love with it. You're a painter. (Not the smartest career choice) But its the thing that keeps you going in life. It's You're one true love. What inspired you to do crazy things.Like seriously crazy things.For example, inviting clayface to your studio to paint him.You swear You're not insane!!! ___ Title is a working name, I know it's kinda cringe. This is also inspired by all the new clayface movie leaks that have been going around, I cant wait for it to come out!!!
